thought: To craft a blue_glazed_terracotta, I need to craft a blue_terracotta. To craft a blue_terracotta, I need to craft a blue_dye. I have 1 cornflower at slot 13, which I can use to craft a blue_dye. Therefore, I will move the cornflower to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1
